thread.section_title: ScreenCountry Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ScreenCountry Inc | www.screencountry.com
thread.title: Jamie Calder
thread.title_full: ScreenCountry Inc reviewed by Jamie Calder

author: Jamie Calder
title: Jamie Calder
text: When my son busted the screen on his 6 week old laptop, I figured I'd need to buy him a new laptop, but I Googled screen replacments and found ScreenCountry had what I needed. I ordered the screen and received it within a few days, and his laptop is like new again. Had no idea it would be such a simple fix.
